name: safe (itch) (miniwoolf)
description:
based on a blackout poem i wrote about my best friend. may we all finally reach "someday."

how to play: use wasd or arrow keys (or on mobile, swipe) to move and interact

notes on development:

  • made in bitsy for me, a version of bitsy (by Adam Le Doux) that i hacked together to better suit my needs
  • tools i used:
    • pixsy and tilesy by ruin
    • bitsy merge, bitsy optimizer, avatar-by-room hack, and transparent-sprites hack by Sean
    • Shiftsy by Brandon Thread

  • recommended listening: [link here]
